homepage.title: MindFull

professional.title: Professional Support
professional.description: Access licensed counsellors and mental health professionals when you need them

personalized.title: Personalized Content
personalized.description: AI-driven recommendations tailored to your specific mental health needs

testimonial1.content: MindfullStudent has completely changed how I handle stress. The AI-driven exercises help me stay on track, and the peer support community makes me feel less alone. I've become more confident and focused!
testimonial1.author: ALEX J

testimonial2.content: I used to struggle with anxiety before exams, but MindfullStudent's mindfulness techniques and expert guidance have helped me stay calm. Now, I feel more balanced and in control
testimonial2.author: PRIYA S

testimonial3.content: MindfullStudent provided me with the tools to manage my mental health effectively. The personalized approach made a huge difference in my daily routine. Highly recommended!
testimonial3.author: ROBERT M

contact.title: Get in Touch
contact.subtitle: Any Queries or Feedback? We are Happy to help you out there!

visionBoard.description: Create digital vision boards that inspire and motivate. Collect images, quotes, and aspirations that help manifest your goals and dreams.
visionBoard.welcomeQuote: Your vision board is a sacred space for your dreams. What you nurture with intention grows.
